body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to our customer support. My name is Matthew Murphy and I am from Virtual Cars Inc. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Matthew, my name is Carol Rodriguez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Carol! Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five two three four one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Carol. Can you also confirm your email address for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is c_rod@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Carol. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you. I'm feeling relieved now that my concerns have been addressed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Carol. Thank you for your time today. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
